thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-RLI Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.29

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-RLI Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.29
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - RlI Corp:
* RLI REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS * Q4 OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.21 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.29 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.49 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* RLI - TJCA LOWERED TAX EXPENSE IN QUARTER, INCREASING NET EARNINGS AND OPERATING EARNINGS BY $0.63/SHARE WITH PERFORMANCE-RELATED INCENTIVE, OTHERS
* RLIâ€˜S NET INVESTMENT INCOME FOR QUARTER INCREASED 9.8% TO $14.4 MILLION, COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD IN 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
